title: Who sells more phones Apple or Samsung? - Quora

response.answer_text: Samsung sells the most phones out of any manufacturer Remember, Apple only makes 1 phone per year (and 1 or 2 variants) Samsung makes 7 or 8 completely different types of phones (+ varients) Apple and Samsung aren't a fair comparison , much different battle strategies The iPhone 11 & Galaxy S20 is a fair competition
